attributes.action: take all measures he can, including fiscal measures, to ensure that, at least within the U.K. and Europe, flying is the most expensive way to travel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As pointed out by several previous petitions it is well-known by now that flying is one of the major causes of climate change.  The most effective way to reduce this is by making it much more expensive than other ways of travelling such as coaches, trains, ferries etc.  
I also deplore the absolute taking for granted of going everywhere by plane; for instance I recently asked a travel agent about going to Amsterdam and the immediate response was "You can fly from..." and when I said I didn't want to fly she seemed completely non-plussed.  And weekend travel supplements in newspapers have details of cheap flights; articles about holidays in almost all resorts also always give the information "flights from..."
